text: Wow, I'm so hungry. Is it lunchtime? Yes, it is. Are you eating here or are you going out? Today, I'm going out. I can show you some places around here. Are you interested? Of course. Any favorite lunch spot around here, Sophie? I know a nice one. It's a cafe right down the street. Is that okay for you? Sounds great. Yeah, it's nice to have a break from the office. It is. Is the cafe within walking distance? Well, it's not far. Come on, we can go together.

dialogue.text: Wow, I'm so hungry. Is it lunchtime?
Are you eating here or are you going out?
Today, I'm going out. I can show you some places around here. Are you interested?
Of course. Any favorite lunch spot around here, Sophie?
I know a nice one. It's a cafe right down the street. Is that okay for you?
Yeah, it's nice to have a break from the office.
It is. Is the cafe within walking distance?
Well, it's not far. Come on, we can go together.
